cause.description:
Go online to : http://www.mlb.com/mlb/events/all_star/y2007/ballot_reg.jsp
and vote for Barry Bonds under NL outfielders. You can vote up to 25 times, however, if you vote once it will save your votes for late use. Please vote as many times as you can.
1. Barry Bonds has had a great Career in the MLB.
2. The All-Star game is in his own home, AT&T Park.
3. This is his last season playing baseball and he is about to break baseball's most coveted record.
4. Who cares about Steroid.. IF he did them anyways.
cause.mission: make sure that Barry can makeup the 42,000 vote deficit to make the starting lineup in the All-Star Game at AT&T Park
cause.name: Vote Barry Bonds for the All-Star Game
